bug.title: Chart only displays two digits of the weight axis
bug.description:
``` What steps will reproduce the problem? If you enter a weight with 3 digits the labeling on the weight axis will omit the first digit. E.g.: 104 kg will be displayed as 04 kg.
What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.5.4 on Android 4.2.2
```
Original issue reported on code.google.com by `manuel.p...@googlemail.com` on 20 Aug 2014 at 11:38
